thread.section_title: 4seating.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 4seating.com | 4seating.com | 3 of 24
thread.title: Krishna P

author: Krishna P
title: Krishna P
text:
When I placed the order, I was told that the items are back ordered and will be delivered in 3 weeks. But it took more than 6 weeks.. Then I sent an e-mail to customer service, there came John Jasso, amazing customer service representative. He called and explained me about the delivery status, since then he was in constant touch through e-mails.. I was awe struck by his prompt response & knowledge on detailing things. Very very satisfied with his service.
Excellent customer support by John Jasso.
